DarkMouse::

"You could say that. On this planet. We are all prisoners of some 
kind. Right now, I work for a great leader. Her name is KitKat. She 
is a bit unusual, but a pretty good leader. You might like her. WE 
can use a good fighter like you on our team. "she smiled slightly." 
When was the last time you ate something? If you let me go, I'll show 
you the mess hall. I'll get you something to eat and we can talk some 
more. If we stay like this, hand on my throat, someone's bound to see 
and fire on you. Personally, someone with your muscle power, I'd 
rather have you for a friend than an enimy." 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Berserk:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "I was sent here by forced by the council on Cybertron," he 
> said. "They decided I was too dangerous to be around other bots due 
> to by purpose orignally. I arrived here. Perhaps their plan was to 
> send me somewhere where I would have no contact and be destroyed 
> myself. Are you a prisioner here as well?"
>
